titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the thirtie day of May. 1591 By M. George Giffard, preacher of the worde of God at Maldon in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by I. Windet for Tobie Cooke, at the Tigers head in Paules Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse of the 133. Psal.
Caption title on A3r: Psalme. 133. Beholde how good and how, &c.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral, Peterborough, England.

place.placeName: the Tigers head in Paules Churchyard
